clothes.title: Black Sleeveless Vest
clothes.description: A premium black vest made with smooth woven fabric that feels soft on the skin. Offers a crisp structure and lightweight comfort. Sleeveless design ideal for layering.

clothes.description: A cream-colored full-sleeve shirt crafted from breathable cotton for all-day comfort. Soft, smooth texture with a clean modern silhouette. Perfect for smart casual wear.

clothes.description: A deep black cardigan made from warm, premium knit fabric. Soft touch with flexible stretch for comfortable layering. Long-sleeve design suitable for cool weather.

clothes.description: A sky-blue full-sleeve shirt made from smooth cotton blend fabric. Lightweight and breathable with a refined finish. Ideal for office and formal occasions.

clothes.description: A navy sweatshirt crafted with soft brushed cotton for warmth and comfort. Smooth finish with durable stitching. Long sleeves make it perfect for everyday wear.

clothes.description: A sleek black blazer made from premium woven fabric with a smooth matte texture. Full sleeves and structured shoulders provide a sharp modern look.

clothes.description: A jet-black zip-up sweater crafted from soft knitted material. Offers great insulation with a comfortable stretch fit. Full sleeves for added warmth.
